step_feedback.feedback: Your arm and shoulder positioning looks good. Try to keep your wrists a bit straighter in this step.
Good job stretching your arms overhead. Focus on keeping your elbows a little straighter as you reach up.
You're doing well with the fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Aim for a straighter wrist as you push down.
Excellent job relaxing and exhaling as you stretch your arms back. Keep those wrists a bit straighter.
You're consistently engaging your shoulders and back. Try to straighten your wrists more as you perform the pumping motion.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straighter throughout the movement, especially when pushing down and reaching overhead. This will help maximize the benefits.
